pages.text: Please note some of the recent changes in my modpack! I feel like these are pretty important and are easy to miss, so that’s why I felt the need to make an entry about them. These may not be permanent.$(br2)$(bold)1.$() Dragonsteel now needs a quadrilium ingot instead of an iron ingot.$(br2)$(bold)2.$() In order to smelt quadrilium blend into its ingot form, it
must be placed inside of a dragon forge with a trilium ingot (used to you’d just slap the blend into a furnace)
